sourcesContent:
<template>
  <BCard title="Configuration" v-show="showPage">
    <BAlert :model-value="retrieveResult !== ''" :variant="errmsg" show>{{ retrieveResult }}</BAlert>
    <BOverlay :show="loading" variant="light" opacity="0.6" rounded="sm"></BOverlay>
    <BForm @submit="onSubmit">
      <BFormGroup id="input-group-1" label="IP address of TCU:" label-for="input-1">
        <BFormInput id="input-1" v-model="config.ipaddress" :state="validateIP" placeholder="192.168.xxx.xxx" required/>
        <BFormInvalidFeedback id="input-live-feedback">
          IP address consist of 4 segments of max 3 digits separated by a .
        </BFormInvalidFeedback>
      </BFormGroup>
      <BButton type="submit" variant="primary">Save</BButton>
    </BForm>
  </BCard>
</template>

<style>
.text-size {
  font-size: 14px;
 }
</style>
<script>

export default {
  components: {
    
  },
  name: 'ConfigPage',
  props: ['showPage'],
  data() {
    return {
      loading: false,
      errmsg: '',
      retrieveResult: ''
    }
  },
  computed: {
    validateIP() {
      var ip = String(config.ipaddress);
      var ipsegs = ip.split(".");
      if (ipsegs != 4) {
        return false;
      }
      for (var seg of ipsegs) {
        if (String(seg).match("^[0-9]{1,3}$") == null ) return false;
      }
      return true;
    }
  },
  methods: {
  },
  watch: {
  },
  mounted() {
  },
}
</script>
